channel.title: Comments on: How to Change Password on MTN HyNetflex
channel.description: Web × Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-change-password-on-mtn-hynetflex/#comment-1371">Njideka</a>.
You can read online about Quickshare settings. I have no first-hand experiene with Quickshare.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Njideka.

You can read online about Quickshare settings. I have no first-hand experiene with Quickshare.

item.title: By: Njideka
item.dc:creator: Njideka
item.description: How do I prevent people from using quick share to connect to my Wi-Fi?
item.content:encoded: How do I prevent people from using quick share to connect to my Wi-Fi?

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-change-password-on-mtn-hynetflex/#comment-1275">George</a>.
It should connect. Try changing your cable.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to George.

It should connect. Try changing your cable.

item.title: By: George
item.dc:creator: George
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-change-password-on-mtn-hynetflex/#comment-1271">Yusuf Odukoya</a>.
Non pls, it seems the router is secured cos I can’t even connect to the Wi-Fi after respect. Once I enter the password the first time, the network will vanish from the search Wi-Fi area
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yusuf Odukoya.

Non pls, it seems the router is secured cos I can’t even connect to the Wi-Fi after respect. Once I enter the password the first time, the network will vanish from the search Wi-Fi area

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-change-password-on-mtn-hynetflex/#comment-1245">George</a>.
Are you sure that no other network is connected to the PC at the time you were doing this?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to George.

Are you sure that no other network is connected to the PC at the time you were doing this?

item.title: By: George
item.dc:creator: George
item.description: How do I change a secure password cos after the hard reset is not still allowing me to connect via Wi-Fi and the MTN home page is not showing when internet cable is used directly
item.content:encoded: How do I change a secure password cos after the hard reset is not still allowing me to connect via Wi-Fi and the MTN home page is not showing when internet cable is used directly

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-change-password-on-mtn-hynetflex/#comment-1015">Adebayo Esther</a>.
You are changing the device password. It has nothing to do with the SIM Card.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Adebayo Esther.

You are changing the device password. It has nothing to do with the SIM Card.

item.title: By: Adebayo Esther
item.dc:creator: Adebayo Esther
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-change-password-on-mtn-hynetflex/#comment-774">Yusuf Odukoya</a>.
Hi can I change the password use another sim card or most it be that same sim from the wifi
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yusuf Odukoya.

Hi can I change the password use another sim card or most it be that same sim from the wifi
